actions.name: Is File Exists
commandline: const { isFileExists } = require( "sampleHandler/sampleHandler" ); return { isExistsStr : isFileExists( %1 ) };

actions.name: Get Message with Current Date & Time
commandline: const { getMsgWithCurrentDateTime } = require( "sampleHandler/sampleHandler" ); return { outputMessage : getMsgWithCurrentDateTime( %1 ) };
